Divine Boon

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Cleric, Channel Divinity: divine fortune class feature
Benefit: Whenever you hit an undead creature with an attack for which you gained a bonus from divine fortune, your attack deals an extra 5 radiant damage.

Published in Dragon Magazine 371, page(s) 8.
